name: Focaccia
description: Baked Italian bread, olive oil, rosemary & coarse salt, served with tomato salsa and a touch of eggplant cream.

name: Garlic & Mozzarella Focaccia
description: Olive oil, garlic, mozzarella & parmesan, tomato salsa.

name: Mushroom Polenta
description: Crispy polenta with Champignon & Portobello mushrooms, garlic, parmesan & rocket leaves.

name: Beet Carpaccio
description: Thinly sliced beet, feta cheese, a salad of pear & fresh mint, olive oil, reduced balsamic vinegar & roasted pistachios.

name: Beef Carpaccio
description: Beef Carpaccio topped with olive oil, reduced balsamic vinegar, arugula & parmesan.

name: Crispy Cauliflower
description: Crispy cauliflower served with Caesar dressing, parsley, lemon & parmesan.

name: Chicken Salad
description: Lettuce hearts, cucumber, assorted cherry tomatoes, broccoli, red onion, baked potato, seasoned chicken breast, tomato salsa & Kalamata olives, tossed in olive oil & fresh squeezed lemon.

name: Artichoke Caesar Salad
description: Lettuce hearts tossed in Caesar dressing, fried artichokes, croutons & parmesan.

name: Roasted Cauliflower & Lentils Salad
description: Roasted cauliflower, black lentils, rocket leaves, red onion, dried tomatoes, feta cheese, pine nuts, lemon zest & garlic confit dressing.

name: Panzanella Salad
description: Tomatoes, cucumbers, assorted cherry tomatoes, small radish, spring onion, red onion, Kalamata olives, celery, capers, croutons, feta cheese & fresh herbs, tossed in olive oil & fresh squeezed lemon.

name: Caprese Salad
description: Tomatoes, assorted cherry tomatoes, basil, Kalamata olives, celery, red onion, sundried tomatoes, artichoke rustic, tomato salsa, fresh mozzarella & reduced balsamic vinegar.

name: Carbonara
description: Classic Linguine, smoked goose breast, forest mushrooms, cream, garlic, ground black pepper & egg yolk.

name: Salmon Crema
description: Green Linguine, cream of spinach, cream, salmon filet, leek, forest mushrooms, spinach & sundried tomatoes.

name: Manzo tirano
description: Pappardelle, pulled meat, leaks, mushrooms, garlic, parsley, chili, and spinach in Napoletana sauce.

name: Chicken Liver and Mushroom Pappardelle
description: Pappardelle, roasted mushrooms, chili, spring onions, garlic, spinach, and chicken livers in beef stock with butter and Napoletana sauce

name: Frutti di Mare
description: Classic Linguine, shrimps, calamari, mussels, garlic, chili & herbs in rose sauce.

name: Pesto Gnocchi
description: Homemade gnocchi, cream, pesto, broccoli, sundried tomatoes, asparagus & parmesan.

name: Vegan Ragù
description: Penne pasta with Napoletana sauce, vegetable ragout, garlic, and parsley

name: Lasagna Ragout
description: Pasta leaves, beef ragout, tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese & parmesan.

name: Margarita
description: Tomato sauce & mozzarella cheese.

name: Melanzana
description: Tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, garlic confit, roasted eggplant, red onion, sundried tomatoes, feta cheese & basil.

name: Primavera
description: Assorted cheeses sauce, roasted cherry tomatoes, garlic confit, Kalamata olives, oregano leaves, fresh mozzarella cheese and reduced balsamic vinegar.

name: Fungi
description: Tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, forest, Champignon & Portobello mushrooms, spinach & parmesan.

name: Calabria
description: Tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, pepperoni & forest mushrooms.

name: Mushrooms Bianca
description: Assorted cheeses sauce, mozzarella cheese, truffle puree, Champignon & Portobello mushrooms, leek & parmesan.

name: Carchofi
description: Tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, artichoke rustic, red onion, Kalamata olives, feta cheese & rocket leaves.

name: Quattro Formaggi
description: Cream of spinach, mozzarella cheese, ricotta, feta, sundried tomatoes & parmesan.

name: Cheese Ravioli
description: Served in tomato / cream / cream & mushroom / rose sauce

name: Sweet Potato Ravioli
description: Served in tomato / cream / cream & mushroom / rose sauce

name: Artichoke Ravioli
description: Artichokes & ricotta ravioli in lemon butter, served with peas, zucchini, broccoli, spinach & feta cheese.

name: Veal & Chestnuts Ravioli
description: Veal & spinach stuffed ravioli in cream, chestnuts & thyme sauce.

name: Sea&sun
description: White vermouth, Campari, watermelon syrup, lemon juice and tonic water. fresh

name: Gin gel bell
description: jin,peach syrup, lemon, sparkling wine and amarena cherry.

description: Aperol, Brut, seltzer water & orange.

name: Bella ciao
description: Frozen cocktail with Rum, basil,pineapple puree and lemon

name: Gewürztraminer
description: Chateau Ste. Michelle, USA Semi-dry.

description: Silverlake, New Zealand

description: Fontana Candida, Italy

description: Umani Ronchi, Italy

description: Notte Rossa, Puglia, Italy

name: Malbec

name: ‘Ripasso’ della Valpolicella
description: ‘Corte Giara’, Allegrini, Italy

name: Tiramisu
description: Espresso soaked ladyfingers, layered with whipped mascarpone cream. Classico Fantastico

name: Crème Brulee
description: Classic vanilla custard topped with caramelized sugar – torched upon order. Cream de la creme

name: Lotus-cheese
description: cheese mousse, based on crispy dough coated with lotus crumble. Perfect ending for a perfect meal!!

name: Soufflé Jandoya
description: Warm chocolate cake with a nougat praline, crisp hazelnuts & vanilla ice cream – a must on every table

name: Affoagato
